question:
Consider the following statements about the “Inclusive India Initiative”:
  1. It is an initiative under Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
  2. It aims to provide skills training and enhance the employability of unemployed
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. The “Inclusive India Initiative” was launched by National Trust under Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment. <u>Second statement is incorrect.</u> ‘Inclusive India Initiative’ of National Trust is specifically catering to persons with intellectual and developmental disabilities; with an objective to include these people in the mainstream and in all important aspects of social life, namely education, employment and community ‘Inclusive India’ in about changing the attitudes.
